questions.quote: I have to. But I'm gonna need to storyboard this whole thing. Where are my magic markers?
Um, well, his false teeth got mangled up in the garbage disposal--
Excuse me, I'm sorry to bother you, I noticed that you have a textbook on tape. May I ask where you got that?
They run it all the time, and now I'm starting to get all these royalty checks.
Oh, wow look, that one is gorgeous. I would just kill for that one.
A joke. Do you have any idea how it feels like to save someone's life?
I know. It's Mickey Mantle's number. So not only is it an all around beautiful name, it is also a living tribute.
That's probably why we're staying here, because you lost money on the stock.
Uh... Excuse me. I couldn't help but notice you offered her a piece of your pie.
I just stopped by to thank you. That risk management stuff you wrote for me? It's killer!
